blogPost.excerpt: New Tab Todo is a simple browser extension which lets you add and manage your day-to-day tasks whenever you open your browser's new tab! Try it & you'll love it..
blogPost.body: New Tab Todo is a simple browser extension which lets you add and manage your day-to-day tasks whenever you open your browser's new tab! Try it & you'll love it..
blogPost.title: NewTabTodo - Task management in your browser's new tab
blogPost.author: Muhammad Ovi

localize.description: 新标签Todo是一个简单的浏览器扩展，让您在打开浏览器的新标签时添加和管理您的日常任务! 试试吧，你会爱上它的。
localize.tagline: 浏览器新标签中的任务管理

localize.description: 新標籤Todo是一個簡單的瀏覽器擴展，讓您在打開瀏覽器的新標籤時添加和管理您的日常任務! 試試吧，你會愛上它的。
localize.tagline: 瀏覽器新標籤中的任務管理

previous.excerpt: This theme was actually inspired by the looks of my portfolio at https://bit.ly/hussein-portifolio and it can really make your vscode look cool! ✌️

next.excerpt: Tiny stocks watcher for the menu bar. Add your favorite tickers to always see the current price. Powered by Yahoo Finance API. Buy on the Mac App Store for $0.99 or free install via Xcode. For any further information or features, feel free to contact me.
next.title: Market Bar - Tiny stocks watcher

localize.description: 微小的股票观察者的菜单栏。添加您喜欢的股票，随时查看当前价格。由雅虎财经API提供支持。在 Mac App Store 上购买，售价 0.99 美元，或通过 Xcode 免费安装。如有任何进一步的信息或功能，请随时联系我。
微小的股票觀察者的菜單欄。添加您喜歡的股票，隨時查看當前價格。由雅虎財經API提供支持。在 Mac App Store 上購買，售價 0.99 美元，或通過 Xcode 免費安裝。如有任何進一步的信息或功能，請隨時聯繫我。
